reviews.review: I have watched this multiple times and I am still finding subtle things that were missed previously. How this didn't win an Oscar for visual special effects is beyond me.

I can't count how many theories I've read, or how many guesses I've seen. I have to say, it had some things I did expect, and many other things that totally surprised me. I reccomend watching the other movies first to get the best experience, but it's understandable if you haven't. I'm going to need a moment before I can forgive the Russo's for messing with my emotions on this one. I loved it, and I can't wait for the next movie! Fair warning: this is a two parter. There's still Acengers 4. You have to see it!
A Marvel universe cinematic Avengers adventure. Make sure to stay and watch the cliffhanger at the end of the credits.?

Amazing!!! Worth the 10 year wait! My only complaint is that the MCU has screwed up  The Hulk beyond repair. I wish we could take back The Hulk we ended up with in this film and in Ragnarok, but other than that, this was a blast!

This movie was extremely impressive to me. The CGI was obviously top notch, and they somehow managed to coherently piece together a story that had over 20 major characters, each with their own in-depth storyline. I've never seen a movie before this one that felt this ambitious, had this much money behind it, and then fully delivered. A definite must-see, even if just for the spectacle of it all.
Awesome! This movie is full of felling. Thanos is incredible !

I am speechless. The Russo brothers deserve an Academy Award for their exceptional work in this film. I thought i waould be able to guess the ending but WOW. Nothing you will predict can get you ready for this.
It is a very good movie that at the last moment leaves you very intrigued, wanting to see more and above all a void in the chest.

Every second of the movie is thrilling and intense, there are very few, if any, uneventful/dull scenes. The movie balances humor better than many marvel movies of this past phase and the movie culminates in one satisfying cliffhanger ending that will leave you begging for the next installment.
